provider.name: Material-Property-Descriptor Database
provider.description: Material-Property-Descriptor Database maintained by Phases Research Lab at Pennsylvania State University

structures.name: anonymizedformula
structures.description: Anonymized formula following tpye AB2 / AB2C4 convention.

structures.name: system
structures.description: Chemical system with elements delimited by - and ordered alphabetically.

structures.name: meanmass
structures.description: Mean mass per atom in atomic units

structures.name: volume
structures.description: Volume of the atomic structure in AA^3

structures.name: reducedmass
structures.description: Reduced mass average (geometric) over pairs of different elements (rather than the structure as a whole)

structures.name: reducedmassall
structures.description: Reduced mass average (geometric) over pairs all atoms

structures.name: poscar
structures.description: A direct access to the POSCAR file stored in a single string

structures.name: formationenergy_sipfenn_krajewski2020_lightmodel
structures.description: Formation energy of the structure in eV/atom predicted by Light Model from Krajewski 2020 SIPFENN models.

structures.name: formationenergy_sipfenn_krajewski2020_novelmaterialsmodel
structures.description: Formation energy of the structure in eV/atom predicted by Novel Materials Model from Krajewski 2020 SIPFENN models.

structures.name: formationenergy_sipfenn_krajewski2020_standardmaterialsmodel
structures.description: Formation energy of the structure in eV/atom predicted by Standard Materials Model from Krajewski 2020 SIPFENN models.

structures.name: stability_sipfenn_amk2020_nmm
structures.description: Predicted stability (convex hull distance) of the structure in eV/atom predicted by Novel Materials Model from Krajewski 2020 SIPFENN models. Note: It is dependent on the other structures in the database.

structures.name: descriptors
structures.description: A dictionary of arrays of features - feature vectors

structures.name: metadata
structures.description: A dictionary of associated MPDD metadata including source of the atomic structure
